attributes.action: bring back capital punishment for killers and rapists and child molesters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop letting killers and rapists and child molesters out in a few years, BRING BACK CAPITAL PUNISHMENT!

rejection.details:
There is already a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/hanging/
You may wish to sign this or you can resubmit your own if you prefer.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
